name: BDSM Sex - Episode 3
description:
A visual novel series about a young woman named Katy. In this episode, she returns to her Master’s dungeon, eager to explore new sensations and push her boundaries.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Episode three begins with a scene in which the Master is surprised that Katy has returned to his dungeon, asking for more.
Her BDSM exploration continues with a steam room, where the heat and moisture envelop her body and leave her feeling both relaxed and vulnerable.
Then she tries new activities that involve the use of urine. Although it can be taboo and humiliating, she trusts her Master enough.
Katy also experiences water play. Tied up, she feels excitedly overwhelmed.
Follow her whole story and discover what else has her Master prepared for her.
We promise a story with arousing dialogue, realistic-looking characters, and high-definition graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
